entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -31.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clyde River Airport 06:45 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -31.8°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -35.7°C
Wind: NNW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 29.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending this morning then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early this morning. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
